channel.title: WarLords Online
channel.description:
[center][img]http://i54.tinypic.com/2937cls.jpg[/img]
[b]WarLords Owner and Coder[/b] Shardyboy
[b]Based Accomplied[/b] Delta Blank Source
[b]Goals to Achieve and Sustain[/b] Perfect Economy, fun MMPORG to play whats free and outstanding.
[img]http://i52.tinypic.com/i25bw4.jpg[/img]
[b]07/08/11[/b] Login Login Character Features Basic Client features Walking Talking Item Dropping Item Pickups shops Added
[i]Changing the way MMPORG alltogether with a difference.[/i][/center]

i know soul erm not to sure really had a break and thought id start fresh.

[/quote]It’s not for me, I think you’ll get more players if the girl was more attractive.[/quote]

On topic: Good luck on this development.
